title: How has your life been impacted by current technology, why? - Quora

response.answer_text: When I was managing hotels new technology was just coming in so as a manager I only had to buy the stuff and not use it.I could never run an hotel today as being dyslexic I would find it impossible, Just to write this answer takes me around 20 min and the use of spell check. So I have no I phone or any other piece of modern piece of technology than this computer. None of my accounts on the computer, my shops are still all cash transaction , So I have now become a bit of a DoDo. I got away with my little problems before but now its impossible>
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Camon Lipscomb Jr.

response.answer_text: Let me reference it with Smartphone… Smartphones just opened a doorway to alot of information about evrything to enhance my spiritual self
